terms.name: contact affiliation
terms.value: The Stowers Institute for Medical Research

description: MS Data Processing- The MS/MS data set was searched using ProLuCID (v. 1.3.3) against a database consisting of 21,402 non-redundant Drosophila melanogaster proteins (downloaded from NCI RefSeq 2013-02-20), 177 usual contaminants, and, to estimate false discovery rates (FDRs), 21,579 randomized amino acid sequences derived from each NR protein entry. To account for alkylation by CAM, 57 Da were added statically to the cysteine residues. To account for the oxidation of methionine to methionine sulfoxide, 16 Da were added as a differential modification to the methionine residue. Peptide/spectrum matches were sorted and selected to an FDR less than 5% at the peptide and protein levels, using DTASelect in combination with swallow, an in-house software.

terms.name: Reference
terms.value: Soffers JHM, Li X, Saraf A, Seidel CW, Florens L, Washburn MP, Abmayr SM, Workman JL. Characterization of a metazoan ADA acetyltransferase complex. Nucleic Acids Res. 2019 Apr 23;47(7):3383-3394.

title: MudPIT analyses of the proteins co-purified with Ada2b-PB-FLAG-HA FLAG-affinity purified from Drosophila melanogaster S2 cells
